price: जब उसके पालनहार ने उसे पवित्र घाटी 'तुवा' में पुकारा।
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
